item.description:
Transformative Sound Meditation Concert @ The Conduit Center

November 17

Wednesday @ 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM

Come join us in a sound meditation concert with Planetary Gongs & Tibetan singing bowls.
The gongs and singing bowls will help you reach a state of deep relaxation and take you on a sound journey to help you retune and rebalance. Experience captivating frequencies of sound and vibration through your ears, your mind and your heart. The serene harmonic overtones and creational sounds of the gongs and singing bowls create the space for you to begin to self-heal. Relax, relieve stress and allow your consciousness to travel to a higher plane.

Price: $20
Reserve spaces left: 20

The Conduit Center
1227 Burnside Avenue #1
East Hartford, CT

Directions: http://www.TheConduit...

http://www.TheConduit...
item.name: Transformative Sound Meditation Concert
